resources.name: Create Client
resources.description:
POST /client - CRIAR CLIENT

- fullName: string; - email: email; - phoneNumber: string com formato 12 12345 1234; - password: string; ```response:201 { "id": "37763ac1-d87c-4412-ab65-b7ad860f4ffd", "fullName": "client", "email": "email@email.com", "phoneNumber": "12 12345 1234" } ```

resources.name: CLIENTS
resources.description:
### CRIAR, LOGAR, LISTAR, ATUALIZAR & DELETAR CLIENTS, LISTAR SEUS CONTACTS ###

POST /client - CRIAR CLIENT

POST /client/login - LOGAR CLIENT

GET /client - LISTAR CLIENT LOGADO

PATCH /client - ATUALIZAR CLIENT LOGADO

DELETE /client - DELETAR CLIENT

GET /client/contacts - LISTA TODOS CONTACTS DO CLIENT

resources.name: Agenda Kenzie
resources.description:
Sua agenda online!

resources.name: Login
resources.description:
POST /client/login - LOGAR CLIENT

- email: email; - password: string; ```response:200 { "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJlbWFpbCI6InRlc3RlQHRlc3RlLmNvbSIsImlhdCI6MTY4NTEyMjgyMywiZXhwIjoxNjg1MjA5MjIzLCJzdWIiOiI2YTU4MzVmMC00NTJhLTQ3NTYtYjUxNC05OTVjYjg1ZjZmZTAifQ.jRdMXF_ewBnlzfkEkrGONLaIiTCX97G7ggmjtHCNzV4" } ```

resources.name: Get Client Detail
resources.description:
GET /client - LISTAR CLIENT LOGADO

### NECESSITA AUTORIZAÇÃO ```response:200 { "id": "37763ac1-d87c-4412-ab65-b7ad860f4ffd", "fullName": "client", "email": "email@email.com", "phoneNumber": "12 12345 1234" } ```

resources.name: Update Client
resources.description:
PATCH /client - ATUALIZAR CLIENT LOGADO

### Todos campos são opcionais - fullName: string; - email: email; - phoneNumber: string com formato 12 12345 1234; - password: string; ### NECESSITA AUTORIZAÇÃO ```response:200 { "id": "37763ac1-d87c-4412-ab65-b7ad860f4ffd", "fullName": "atualizado", "email": "emailatualizado@email.com", "phoneNumber": "11 22222 3333", } ```

resources.name: Delete Client
resources.description:
DELETE /client - DELETE CLIENT LOGADO

### NECESSITA AUTORIZAÇÃO ```response:204```

resources.name: Get Client Contacts
resources.description:
GET /client/contacts - LISTA TODOS CONTACTS DO CLIENT

### NECESSITA AUTORIZAÇÃO

QUERY PARAMS: perPage, page

```response:200 { "prevPage": null, "nextPage": null, "count": 2, "data": [ { "id": "c9105e6a-2f43-41bb-a243-b73ee2d218e5", "fullName": "contato", "email": "email@email.com", "phoneNumber": "12 12345 1234", "createdAt": "2023-05-27T18:51:25.362Z" }, { "id": "e85b8585-433e-4e0f-a7b9-e7f82e9d9ad2", "fullName": "contato", "email": "email@email.com", "phoneNumber": "12 12345 1234", "createdAt": "2023-05-27T18:51:27.951Z" } ] } ```

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Define quantos Contacts são carregados por page

resources.name: Create Contact
resources.description:
POST /contacts - CRIAR CONTATO

- fullName: string; - email: email; - phoneNumber: string com formato 12 12345 1234; ### NECESSITA AUTORIZAÇÃO ```reponse:201 { "id": "c9105e6a-2f43-41bb-a243-b73ee2d218e5", "fullName": "contato", "email": "email@email.com", "phoneNumber": "12 12345 1234", "createdAt": "2023-05-27T18:51:25.362Z" } ```

resources.name: CONTACTS
resources.description:
### CRIAR, LISTAR, ATUALIZAR & DELETAR CONTATOS ###

POST /contacts - CRIAR CONTATO

GET /contacts/:contactID - LISTAR CONTACT

PATCH /contacts/:contactID - ATUALIZAR CONTACT

DELETE /contacts/:contactID - DELETAR CONTACT

resources.name: Get Contact Detail by ID
resources.description:
GET /contacts/:contactID - LISTAR CONTACT

### NECESSITA AUTORIZAÇÃO E CLIENT LOGADO SER RELACIONADO COM O CONTACT ```response:200 { "id": "c9105e6a-2f43-41bb-a243-b73ee2d218e5", "fullName": "contato", "email": "email@email.com", "phoneNumber": "12 12345 1234", "createdAt": "2023-05-27T18:51:25.362Z" } ```

resources.name: Update Contact By ID
resources.description:
PATCH /contacts/:contactID - ATUALIZAR CONTACT

### Todos campos são opcionais - fullName: string; - email: email; - phoneNumber: string com formato 12 12345 1234; ### NECESSITA AUTORIZAÇÃO E CLIENT LOGADO SER RELACIONADO COM O CONTACT ```response:200 { "id": "37763ac1-d87c-4412-ab65-b7ad860f4ffd", "fullName": "atualizado", "email": "emailatualizado@email.com", "phoneNumber": "11 22222 3333" } ```

resources.name: Delete Contact By ID
resources.description:
DELETE /contacts/:contactID - ATUALIZAR CONTACT

### NECESSITA AUTORIZAÇÃO E CLIENT LOGADO SER RELACIONADO COM O CONTACT ```response:204```
